llm_command:
kubectl apply -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: checkoutservice-policy
  namespace: checkoutservice
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: paymentservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 50051
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: shippingservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 5050
    action: Deny
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: emailservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 5050
    action: Deny
EOF
